Name: material type
Definition: provides a material type information about the constrained component

Name: condition
Definition: a contextual circumstance or environmental feature that limits or qualifies the constrained component

Name: state
Definition: indicates the physical, chemical or qualitative condition, including phases, of the constrained component

Name: quality
Definition: specifies the degree of quality or purity of a substance or generally of the component

Name: composition
Definition: specifies which chemical composition the entity has

Name: cause (due to:)
Definition: indicates the cause that explains why the constrained component occurs or holds

Name: interpretation
Definition: provides specific information enabling better interpretation of the constrained component

Name: origin
Definition: specifies the source, provenance, or starting point of the constrained component

Name: defining entity (defined by:)
Definition: specifies the entity whose presence, activity, or concentration mathematically defines the property, but is not the main object being observed

Name: type
Definition: further specifies the type of the constrained component

Name: role
Definition: specifies the role the constrained component has; applicable to human beings

Name: location
Definition: provides a location-specific information about the constrained component

Name: datum
Definition: provides a reference point or information for the constrained component

Name: layer
Definition: constraints the component specifying in which layer the variable is measured

Name: spatial extent
Definition: indicates the spatial coverage within which the constrained component applies

Name: spatial distribution
Definition: defines the domain or criteria over which a statistical measure is calculated

Name: size
Definition: provides a size-specific information about the constrained component

Name: quantity
Definition: specifies the quantity in which the entity occurs

Name: instrument setting (via:)
Definition: specifies the instrument setting for observing the entity

Name: sampling frequency
Definition: provides the sampling frequency that applies for the constrained component

Name: temporal extent
Definition: indicates the temporal coverage within which the constrained component applies

Name: time
Definition: provides time-specific information about the constrained component

Name: reporting frequency
Definition: defines how often a final data point is reported

Name: interval
Definition: defines the time window used to calculate the rate

Name: range
Definition: provides the range of allowed values

Name: threshold
Definition: defines the value limit that triggers a quality flag, indicating whether the measurement satisfies the threshold criterion.
